directions: In large bowl, cream together the shortening, sugar, egg, milk, and vanilla.  Stir until well blended. In a separate bowl, mix the flour, baking powder and salt.  Add to egg mixture and mix well. Cover and chill for 4 hours.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).  Grease baking sheets.
Roll out dough on a floured surface to a 1/4 inch thickness.  Cut out cookies with round cookie cutter and place 1 inch apart on cookie sheets.
Bake 18 to 20 minutes until lightly colored.  Cool on wire racks.
title: Vanilla Wafers I
